price: Sisi hatukusikia haya katika mila hii ya mwisho. Haya si chochote ila ni uzushi tu.
arabic: مَا سَمِعۡنَا بِهَٰذَا فِي ٱلۡمِلَّةِ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا ٱخۡتِلَٰقٌ
footnotes: Hatujapata kusikia haya mambo ya Tawhidi, kumfanya Mungu mmoja tu, katika dini ya baba zetu tulio wawahi kuwaona. Haya si chochote ila ni uwongo tu ulio zuliwa.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: mā samiʿ'nā bihādhā fī al-milati al-ākhirati in hādhā illā ikh'tilāqun
